purpose: Curate and provide a comprehensive list of AI coding tools to assist developers in finding suitable AI-based coding assistants, completion engines, and refactoring tools.
principle: Aggregates and categorizes various AI coding tools available in the market, providing descriptions and links to their respective repositories or documentation.
name: awesome-code-ai
description: A list of AI coding tools (assistants, completions, refactoring, etc.)
highlight: Comprehensive list of AI coding tools categorized for easy navigation by developers.
